description: The heavy-duty Polar Expedition Parka is ready to keep you warm and fully protected from extreme winter weather. It takes inspiration from the Arktis Parka, but has been updated with improved quality down, new features and added repairability. On the inside: large, 700 fill-power down baffles and an inner baffle collar to keep your neck warm and stop heat escaping. On the outside: hardwearing G-1000, reinforced with G-1000 HeavyDuty on the chest, elbows, underside of forearms and the rear for improved durability in high exposure areas. A hardy, long-term companion for the deepest of winters.
name: Fjallraven Polar Expedition Parka - Mens
